ing: 1 pound cooked, peeled, and deveined shrimp
salt and black pepper to taste
des:
"Bloody Mary mix gives this ceviche a good kick. Cooked shrimp makes this ceviche a time-saver.  Always a crowd-pleaser. Serve in martini glasses for a great presentation!
"
ins: Lightly mix the shrimp, tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, and cilantro in a bowl, and pour in the Bloody Mary mix. Squeeze the limes over the mixture, add a dash of hot pepper sauce, and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Toss again, cover the bowl, and refrigerate for 3 to 4 hours, stirring occasionally.
